submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        i = len(horizontalCut) - 1
        j = len(verticalCut) - 1
        h_parts = 1
        v_parts = 1
        ans = 0

        while i >= 0 and j >= 0:
            if horizontalCut[i] >= verticalCut[j]:
                ans += (v_parts * horizontalCut[i])
                h_parts += 1
                i -= 1
            else:
                ans += (h_parts * verticalCut[j])
                v_parts += 1
                j -= 1
        
        while i >= 0:
            ans += (v_parts * horizontalCut[i])
            i -= 1
        
        while j >= 0:
            ans += h_parts * verticalCut[j]
            j -= 1
        
        return ans
